title: Mafia Roulette
description: Mafia Roulette Play against the mafia with 5 lives each. Only one survives. Use 3 starting cards to: Deal more damage or block attacks Draw or steal cards Change rules mid-game Bet tokens to test your luck. Each move is critical - risk for rewards or play it safe? Every round tests strategy, psychology, and chance. Ready to prove you're the ultimate gambler?
instructions: GAME RULES: Your goal is to defeat the enemy. How you do it is up to you. In your revolver, there are 6 bullets, and 2 of them are live. You decide how to use your turn to shoot. You have 5 lives in total. The one who runs out of lives faster loses. For any shot at the enemy (live or blank), the turn passes to the opponent. All game controls are implemented using the mouse.

title: Real Motorbike Super Hero Stunt 3D
description: In this bike racing game performs insane stunts to impress. In bike stunts game you can show different type of stunts like jumping in the air and drifting as stunts man. Ride your bike in motorbike simulator 3d city environment while doing a stunt as a great biker for bike lovers.
instructions: Use W,A,S,D For player movement. Press Shift+W to boost player.

title: SPRUNKI GETS SURGERY
description: SPRUNKI GETS SURGERY ?? OREN, a genius (but reckless) surgeon, must save PINKI after a brutal facial injury—without anesthesia! As more SPRUNKIS like TUNNER, shot in the head, flood the ER, OREN races against time. But lurking in the shadows is BLACK, ready to turn OREN’s mission into a nightmare. Will OREN save them all, or will BLACK end it in tragedy?
instructions: Cut, stitch, and extract foreign objects Balance patient vitals under pressure Deal with unexpected disruptions from BLACK Save (or lose) SPRUNKIS based on your skill!

title: My DOGY Virtual Pet
description: Meet Dogy, your adorable virtual pet who needs your love and care! My Dogy Virtual Pet is a fun and engaging pet simulation game where you take care of an adorable puppy. Feed him when he's hungry, give him a bath to keep him clean, and play fun games together to keep him happy. When he's tired, tuck him in for a good rest. Dogy will react to how well you take care of him, so make sure he always feels loved!
instructions: Use the mouse or touch the screen to interact with Dogy and the objects. Follow the instructions on the screen. You can see the needs progression of the Dogy in the icons at the top of the screen. Try to keep the bars full attending the needs in each room.

title: Sprunki Shooter 2025
description: Sprunki Shooter 2025 is a free to play online game that delivers exciting shooting action in a colorful and challenging world. Players must navigate through each level, clearing obstacles and defeating enemies to reach the exit. The goal is to complete all levels by unlocking the exit doors. To do this, players must shoot and collect all the scattered diamonds while avoiding or eliminating dangerous enemies along the way. Have fun!
instructions: WADS to move. Mouse to shoot.

title: Mega Escape Car Parking Puzzle
description: A fun and compelling puzzle board game called Parking Jam. It's more than just parking; it's an enjoyable driving adventure that will advance you. Parking lot traffic jams, difficult parking conditions, irate seniors, and more. Play one of the best parking board games, earn rewards and unlock skins, solve harder and harder puzzles, decide which car to move to find smooth departs without hitting anybody or anything, characteristics.
instructions: Move the objects to solve the puzzle.

title: Quiz Squid Round
description: Dive into the trivia world with Quiz Squid Game. This unique game puts your knowledge of the popular series to test. Not just about general knowledge, but the devil is in the details of this mysterious and thrilling TV show. Get ready to answer questions about plot twists, characters, and little known facts about-in game universe. Impress your friends with your trivia skills and detailed memory of this cinema spectacle.
instructions: The gameplay mechanics are simple yet challenging. Each round presents a series of questions, requiring you to select the correct answer from multiple options. Use your mouse or touchscreen to select the right answer. As you progress through rounds, you'll encounter increasingly complex questions, testing your attention to detail within the series.

title: Magic Sorting
description: Magic Sorting is a simple and relaxing game for all ages. Place objects next to each other to collect 3 identical objects in a row.
instructions: Place objects along the portals, connect three identical objects in a row to make them disappear. To complete the level, you must clear all portals of objects. As you earn points, you can unlock more different avatars, portals, and backgrounds. Use a magic wand to remove paired items. Use a magnifying glass to highlight identical objects. On your computer: Drag items with the left mouse button. On the phone: Drag items with your finger.

title: Makeup Trends: Then And Now
description: Step into the exciting world of makeup transformations with Makeup Trends: Then And Now! Join influencer Kiki as you explore the evolution of beauty trends from the early 2000s to 2024. Experiment with y2k-VSCO and emo-euphoria dark looks, mixing vibrant eyeshadows, bold lip colors, and edgy styles. Customize unique hairstyles and accessories to complete your makeup looks. With endless possibilities to mix and match, become a beauty trendsetter in this fun and engaging game for girls.
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game on a desktop, tap to play on mobile devices.

title: Merge Fusion
description: Merge Fusion is an entertaining and addictive casual game where you combine and evolve items to create superior versions. The goal is to drag and merge identical items, triggering new fusions and unlocking more challenging levels as you progress. The game features simple, relaxing gameplay that is perfect for unwinding. Experience the satisfaction of watching your creations grow progressively in complexity as you explore new possibilities with each merge.
instructions: To play Merge Fusion, use your finger to drag items across the screen. Choose the direction in which you want an item to move by dragging, then release your finger to drop the item into the desired position. Merging identical items will create more powerf

title: Quizmania: Trivia game
description: Sharpen your mind across exciting levels. Answer a variety of questions from different topics and use strategic hints to guide your way. As you progress, the difficulty increases, offering a rewarding and challenging experience with every round.
instructions: The player must answer quiz questions by selecting the correct answer from four options. Players can use hints to assist in answering. Progress is tracked through a bar that fills as they play, allowing them to unlock and use clues for future questions.

title: Office Brawl - Room Smash
description: Become the hero of an office rebellion and destroy everything in your path! The player will have to transform into a disgruntled employee who challenges the system, destroys obstacles and fights the boss. Use brute force and ingenuity to get through difficult tests, participate in intense battles and explosive actions. Become an antihero and sow chaos from start to finish!
instructions: The goal of the game is to rebel against the office system, destroy everything in your path, defeat the boss and overcome all obstacles to feel the taste of freedom and become an unstoppable antihero.

title: Monsterella Fantasy Makeup
description: Step into the monstrous world of beauty with "Monsterella Fantasy Makeup". This spookily engaging game lets you work your makeover magic on three iconic cartoon characters. In Frankie's unit, electrify her look with eerie eyeshadows, neon lipstick, shockingly cool hairstyles, and otherworldly outfits. Next, embrace Clawdeen's earthy mystique with jewel-toned makeup and howl-inducing wardrobe choices. Finally, express Draculaura's vamp chic vibe with dramatic makeup and goth-glam ensembles.
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game on a desktop, tap to play on mobile devices.

title: TCG Card Clicker
description: TCG Card Clicker is an addictive clicker game inspired by TCG Card Shop Simulator, where collecting never stops! Click to earn coins, open card packs, and expand your collection with over 8000 unique cards. Each card boosts your passive income, letting you earn more even when you're not clicking! Trade duplicates to discover new cards and complete your ultimate collection. Can you find the rarest cards and become the ultimate collector
instructions: Click to Earn Coins Open Card Packs Earn Passive Income Trade Cards

title: Cowboys Duel
description: In this fast-paced cowboy showdown, players can either compete solo or engage in a thrilling duel against a friend, testing their reflexes and quick draw skills. Will you answer the call to become the fastest and most skilled cowboy around?
instructions: The navigation in this game is very simple. Just use mouse on desktop or your finger tap on mobile devicews.

title: angry snake io
description: Angry Snake io " is an exciting and addictive arcade game where you take control of a fierce, hungry snake on a mission to grow, survive, and dominate the arena! Slither through a vibrant world, gobbling up colorful orbs to grow longer and stronger. But watch out—danger lurks around every corner! Avoid obstacles, outsmart traps, and navigate increasingly challenging levels as your snake grows bigger and faster.
instructions: Angry Snake io " is an exciting and addictive arcade game

title: GTA: Grand Vegas Crime
description: Grand Vegas Crime is an open-world action game set in a sprawling city inspired by Las Vegas. Players take on the role of a daring gangster looking to rise through the criminal underworld. The game offers intense missions, thrilling car chases, and fierce shootouts against rival gangs and law enforcement. Grand Vegas Crime delivers an adrenaline-pumping experience filled with crime, action, and adventure.
instructions: E - Enter/Exit Vehicles WASD - Move Mouse Mouse - Look Around Left Mouse Click - Hit/Shoot Escape - Pause Game

title: GT Drift Most Wanted
description: Drift your way around each level and hit all the snow piles while avoiding barriers. With responsive controls and a focus on timing and precision, players must master their drifting skills to clear each stage and become the ultimate Drift Master. In this game, players can purchase different cars, each offering a unique driving experience. There’s no customization—just pick your favorite car and hit the track!
instructions: Arrow key or W/D to move

title: Cafe Owner Business Simulator
description: Build your dream cafe and become a successful business owner in Cafe Owner: Business Simulator! Restore your dad cafe and turn an abandoned space into a thriving restaurant. This exciting and simulation game lets you experience what it’s like to run your own cafe, from cleaning up to expanding into a successful cafe business.
instructions: Use W,A,S,D FOR player movement and different instructions to complete.

title: Dress Princess
description: You will transform into a fashion stylist, creating a unique look for the beautiful princess! The game offers a vast array of gorgeous clothing styles, from sparkling evening gowns to fresh and sweet daily dresses, everything is available. Every piece of clothing is carefully designed, with exquisite details displayed in every detail.
instructions: In terms of accessories, they are equally rich and diverse, with dazzling necklaces and sparkling earrings that can add finishing touches to the princess's style. You can mix and match as you please, fully unleash your fashion creativity, and create a unique style exclusive to princesses. Whether it's an elegant and noble ball look or a playful and cute casual outfit, everything is up to you to decide. Come and embark on this wonderful dressing up journey!

title: Turbo Stars
description: Hop on your skateboard and speed down the track in this wild and fast-paced racing game! Zoom through a wide variety of exhilarating tracks and defeat your opponents! Think fast to pick up items that will help you gain an advantage — or even pick up and throw your competitors if they get too close to you! Don’t forget to snatch coins and keys to unlock a whole bunch of awesome items, including power-ups, new objects to ride on, and gear for your character.
instructions: Use WASD or arrow keys to drive!

title: Memory Wars
description: Memory Wars takes the classic memory-matching game to a whole new level with exciting battles, unique enemies, and powerful card effects. Use your brainpower and tactics to overcome a variety of foes and emerge victorious in every stage!
instructions: Tap to match cards. Each time you turn a card, you lose energy. If the cards match, you will damage the enemy.

title: BFFs Luxury Loungewear
description: Get ready to style your way to comfort in the BFFs Luxury Loungewear game! Join the fun with Riri, Elsa, Polka, and Bonnie, each with a unique wardrobe. Choose from jersey cotton, knitted, velour, or silk sleepwear and accessories to create stylish sleepover outfits. Exercise your fashion skills and make every slumber party a plush, luxury affair. This game is perfect for budding fashionistas and dress-up game enthusiasts alike!
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game on a desktop, tap to play on mobile devices.

title: Bubble Shooter Blast
description: In the game you can become an experienced bubble shooter. You just need to choose a ball and shoot at the right place to burst the bubbles. You have to go through more than 200 levels, so play this exciting game and start popping bubbles. Collect and shoot 3 or more bubbles to experience a sweet victory! Blow up all the balloons with your quick thinking and tactics. The next level will be harder than the previous one. Are you ready to burst all the balloons in this game?
instructions: The goal of the game is to shoot balls, collect the same side by side in 3 or more pieces. Control on a mobile device: swipe/touch PC control: LMB

title: Go To Zero
description: Test your math skills in Go To Zero! Merge numbers and mathematical symbols to bring the result down to zero. Clear the screen and solve handcrafted puzzles that challenge your logic and calculation abilities!
instructions: Combine numbers and math symbols to reach zero. Clear all elements from the screen to complete each level. Use logic and strategy to solve increasingly challenging puzzles!

title: Black Pink St.Patricks day Concert
description: Step into the glamorous world of Black Pink St. Patrick’s Day Concert, the ultimate dress-up game! Style your favorite Black Pink members with trendy outfits, accessories, and makeup to make them shine for their St. Patrick’s Day performance. With simple controls and endless creativity, this game is perfect for quick fun or long gaming sessions.
instructions: Left Mouse button Click or Tap to Play

title: Merge Galaxy
description: The famous merge game is arrived! You can shoot the planets like balls to throw, and when the same planets touch each other, it becomes bigger planet! Cute planets want to be bigger, so keep merge the planets until you make the sun!
instructions: When small planets touch each other, they become bigger planets If you calculate the gravity to position the planets, it will help you to put the planets in the right spots. At random timing, you can use extra help from strolling space ship, Space Tornado or 'Beyond space' button after you click them.

title: Noob Shooter: Gun Battle 3D
description: Noob Shooter: Gun Battle 3D is an exciting cooperative shooter created for true fans of action and intense battles. If you like games like CS, Warface and CoD, then this project will definitely not disappoint you. Join your team and engage in battle against opponents, striving for the main goal - to get as many kills as possible. The team that first reaches the required number of frags will be the winner.
instructions: The goal of the game "Noob Shooter: Gun Battle 3D" is to destroy opponents in a cooperative with a team and be the first to get the required number of kills to win. Desktop controls: WASD - movement; Mouse - view; Left mouse button - attack; Right mouse button - aim; Space - jump; Shift - run; R - reload; C - crouch; H - grenade; 1,2,3 - weapon selection; Mobile device controls - touch/swipe.

title: Stack Fall
description: Smash the floor! Are you under stress? Maybe Stack Fall can help you to release the stress. As your ball keep breaking the floors to get to the goal, every smashing will ease your stress. It's time to break some stacks!
instructions: Touch the screen to drop the bouncy ball will smash all the pillars in the way down. If the ball hit the black part of the floor, it's a game-over, so try to avoid it to break the floor. If you collect the gauges and become a fiver mode, nothing can stop the ball.

title: Celebrity Spring Manicure Design
description: Step into the glamour of ‘Celebrity Spring Manicure Design’! Explore a world of trendy nail art, vibrant colors, and chic designs. Join celebrities in setting the trend for spring nails. Elevate your style with creative manicures, from floral elegance to modern motifs. Immerse yourself in the art of nail fashion and transform your fingertips into a canvas of spring-inspired beauty.
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: Mahjong Crimes - Puzzle Story
description: MYSTERIOUS FEATURES Play 100+ Mahjong exciting levels! Dive into Agatha Christie's stories Use boosters and collect tile sets PLAY MAHJONG Mahjong Crimes is a puzzle game where you match tiles to find clues and solve crimes. Use power-ups to beat tricky levels and win awards! SOLVE CRIMES Join detective Hercule Poirot on the Orient Express to solve crimes in this Mahjong game! Match tiles to investigate, defeat thugs, and untangle mysteries. Fun guaranteed!
instructions: Solve the puzzles by eliminating pairs of identical mahjong tiles from play. You can only select the tiles if the left and right sides are free, and if there are no other tiles on top. Wipe the entire board to finish every level. Use the mouse or touchscreen to play.

title: Knife Master : Ball Racing
description: Chop chop chop, throw the knife, but don't hit the ball~! It's like the mastery of circus performer. Which means, it's fun! Let's be the master of throwing knives and bounce the ball to the sky!
instructions: The ball is bouncing up as it drop to the handle of the knife. As you throw knife higher as much possible, the ball bounce up higher! Let's challenge to throw many knives as fast as possible to reach the top without stabbing the ball.

title: Sprunki 3D Shooter
description: Sprunki 3D Shooter delivers nonstop action as you face off against waves of Sprunkies! Your mission is simple: shoot to survive as long as you can. Run out of ammo? Search the battlefield for scattered rounds to keep the fight alive. Gear up and prepare to take on the Sprunkies—can you last the challenge?
instructions: Use WASD to move around and left mouse click to shoot!

title: Mahjong Riddles: Egypt
description: Welcome to the mysterious world of Ancient Egypt! Find matching tiles, solve mahjong levels and collect artifacts to uncover secrets of Giza valley, Old city, Desert and Nile. Discover how the Great Pyramid of Giza was constructed, how Egyptians learned to read hieroglyphs, why only the pharaoh could own a cat in Ancient Egypt and many more. Simple and engaging gameplay of mahjong solitaire is the best way to relax. You will find huge treasures, tricky locks, new bonus tiles and more.
instructions: Collect pairs of matching tiles to clear the board.

title: Fast Ball Jump
description: Let’s prepare yourself to feel happy and relaxed by playing going balls. Roll, spin, jump and don’t lose lives because unexpected obstacles lie ahead. Get ready & participate in an epic roll ball race in a different environment. You will have a lot of fun in your spare time by playing green ball run 2048 and journey ball sky.
instructions: Swipe to move

title: Hangman Saga
description: Challenge your vocabulary with Hangman Saga! With thousands of levels, each word includes a category hint to guide you—like "Profession" for "Doctor." Guess the letters wisely, but too many mistakes end the game! Need help? Use the hint button for a clue. Perfect for all ages, this fun and educational word puzzle will keep you entertained while sharpening your spelling skills. Can you solve them all?
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to tap the letters, guess the words, and fill in the blanks to complete the word.

title: Real GT Racing Simulator
description: "Real GT Racing Simulator" offers the ultimate driving experience for racing enthusiasts. Get behind the wheel of meticulously detailed cars and race on stunningly realistic tracks. Compete in high-speed circuits, fine-tune your vehicle for peak performance, and rise through the ranks to become a true racing legend. This game emphasizes authentic driving physics, customizable cars, and a variety of racing modes—from casual races to full championship tournaments.
instructions: WASD/Arrow keys - move space - brake shift - boost R - reposition

title: Jello Bubbles
description: Classic Match 3 Bubble Shooter Game with jello balls, challenges, a nice bird and a fantastic heroine. Enjoy with lots of fun levels travelling around the world.
instructions: Match 3 or more bubbles with the same color and clear levels, accomplish the game objective to advance to the next one. Aim & shoot with the Jell-O-Matic Machine ®, to drop & blast all bubbles. A funny hummingbird helps you with nice boosters. Click on the screen and drag the mini bubbles aim and lift it to shot. Take your time to aim and hit your desired bubble to make it pop.

title: Children's doctor: treating ears
description: Ready to become the best pediatric doctor in the world? Learn to use medical instruments, give first aid to patients? Play our doctor without downloads, registration and absolutely free!
instructions: Use your mouse (to play on your computer), or your finger (to play on your phone) to click and control the ✂ instruments you have chosen to treat patients. Follow the on-screen prompts and you'll start to succeed very soon!

title: Tiles Matching
description: Free online game Tiles Matching - play in the browser without downloading. It is suitable for the development of logic for both adults and children - an ideal timekiller. Tiles Matching is a puzzle game combining the game mechanics of Mahjong and Three in a Row (Match-3). A logical educational game for children and adults. With each level, the difficulty increases - not everyone can complete the game the first time. Challenge your intelligence.
instructions: Match 3 blocks of the same element so that they match each other. Match and remove all the tiles to complete the level. The game has a large number of levels that are becoming more difficult.

title: Fight for the Tree
description: The gaming world is facing a serious tree crisis. Evil forces are running wild, and the trees are in great danger. As a player, your mission is to protect these precious trees. Even when you're offline, your character will keep fighting to safeguard the trees, constantly accumulating experience and resources. In the game, there's also a group of cute little sapling creatures imprisoned by the evil forces. You need to rescue them one by one through battles, explorations, and so on.
instructions: In the mysterious game world, Evil forces are raging everywhere. As a player, you bear the sacred mission of guarding trees.During the battle, the character will automatically attack the enemy, continuously accumulating experience points and various resources. There are multiple maps with different styles in the game, ranging from tranquil forests to mysterious valleys.

title: Zombies and Guns
description: Urgently save: the evil spirits are coming! You are a Fighter, who is attacked by hordes of zombies and all sorts of evil spirits! Don't let them eat you alive!
instructions: The goal of the game is to destroy zombies in a variety of ways, constantly improve your weapons and complete as many levels as possible! Controls: Movement - W, S, A, D Menu - ESC Shot - LMB Additional shot - RMB Dash - Space Shop - Enter Throw a grenade - G Place a turret - E Call for support - Q Take additional weapons - Tab

title: Tile Connect Pair Match Puzzle
description: Match & connect tiles of same color & be the master of pair matching puzzle game. In this you have to find and match the same objects. There are different objects.
instructions: Match The things to complete the game. Click on same objects to match them.

title: ChessField
description: Master chess piece movements in ChessField! Navigate a 2D grid using classic chess rules—rooks move straight, bishops diagonally, and more. But there’s a twist: moving up also makes your piece fall! Challenge Your Mind: Start with simple levels to learn the mechanics, then tackle increasingly tricky puzzles. Think strategically and solve creative challenges to advance!
instructions: Move your piece following chess rules—rooks move straight, bishops diagonally, etc. Remember: moving up also makes your piece fall down. Solve puzzles by reaching the goal while avoiding obstacles. Think strategically to complete increasingly difficult levels!

title: Shelf Sweep
description: Get ready to tidy up the shelves in Shelf Sweep! Dive into a fun and addictive sorting puzzle game where your goal is to clean up messy shelves layer by layer. Only the outermost layer of items is visible—clear them by matching three identical items, and reveal the hidden treasures beneath!
instructions: Select a visible item from the outermost layer of the shelf. Match three identical items to remove them from the shelf. Use your skills to clean up all the shelves and solve challenging puzzles!

title: Domino World
description: Play a timeless game of dominoes where strategy rules and every move matters. Unlock exclusive trophies and collectible wooden sets as you progress. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts seeking endless fun and challenges.
instructions: Dominoes involves placing tiles to match numbers and score points. You can customize your game with 8 collectible domino sets and choose between Block and Draw modes for varied gameplay. Accelerate your progress by collecting sets and unlock exclusive bonuses through the Trophy Road.

title: Tattoo Master
description: Try your hand at being a tattoo artist. Give your customers beautiful and crazy tattoos! Сhoose different styles and use different colors! And the most important - enjoy the gameplay experience.
instructions: Use various gameplay mechanics to complete the level and get more difficult orders. Feel like a salon manager, draw and complete more and more complex drawings.

title: Animal Merge: Bubble Shooter
description: Welcome to Animal Merge, where you evolve adorable creatures by merging bubbles! Launch, connect, and combine animal bubbles to create advanced species. Watch as identical animals merge into exciting new forms! Keep merging to reach the ultimate evolution and complete your goal. Use special tools to boost progress. With each level, the challenge grows—can you master merging and collect all the final animals? Jump in and start merging now!
instructions: To play Animal Merge, tap an animal bubble to select it, drag backward to aim, and release to launch. When two identical bubbles collide, they merge into an upgraded version. Keep merging to evolve creatures until you reach the final one!

title: Bunnys Farm
description: Embark on a delightful fruit match-3 adventure with Bunny's Farm: Zen Match Master. Join your cheerful companion, Bunny, as you traverse diverse landscapes—from lush meadows and snowy peaks to desert dunes and tropical beaches. Match juicy fruits like oranges and peaches to solve engaging puzzles, uncover enchanting stories, and unlock new chapters in this relaxing yet challenging journey.
instructions: - Gameplay Basics: Swap adjacent fruits to align three or more identical ones, clearing them from the board. - Objective: Achieve specific goals for each level, such as reaching a target score or collecting designated fruits. - Power-Ups: Create special fruit combinations to generate power-ups that can clear rows, columns, or entire sections. - Progression: Advance through levels to explore new environments and encounter increasingly complex puzzles.

title: Furry Kung Fu
description: Furry Kung-Fu & Babushka is a humorous fighting game with fun cartoon graphics, where controlling Cat or Babushka you need to inflict the enemy a series of hand-to-hand strikes, managing to dodge the sinister ball and sausage, which every second flies at you. Engage in epic hand-to-hand combat with park troublemakers. Earn achievements, get coins, unlock player skins! Will you be able to throw enemy sausage back at them? How long can you hold out? It's time to find out!
instructions: Controls on PC: arrow keys. Control on mobile: swipe and tap on the screen. Punch left: left arrow / tap on the screen to the left of the player. Punch right: right arrow / tap on the screen to the right of the player. Combo: multiple taps to the side you want to combo / multiple taps to the left or right of the player.
